metadata.Title: CVE-2019-5427 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
c3p0 version < 0.9.5.4 may be exploited by a billion laughs attack whenloading XML configuration due to missing protections against recursiveentity expansion when loading configuration.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-5427` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libc3p0-java - 0.9.1.2-9+deb8u1ubuntu0.18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: c3p0 package in esm-apps/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.9.1.2-9+deb8u1ubuntu0.18.04.1').
